verses.name: Exodus 27:15
verses.text: And on the other side shall be hangings fifteen cubits: their pillars three, and their sockets three.

verses.name: Exodus 27:16
verses.text: And for the gate of the court shall be an hanging of twenty cubits, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework: and their pillars shall be four, and their sockets four.

verses.name: Exodus 27:17
verses.text: All the pillars round about the court shall be filleted with silver; their hooks shall be of silver, and their sockets of brass.
